edges.name: Arsenal
edges.description: The Hunter has access to a wide variety of weapons that are generally not available to the public.
edges.edge_pool: Intelligence + Craft (own arsenal) or Manipulation + Streetwise (contacts)
edges.system: Win test at Difficulty 4 to provide a single personal firearm or melee weapon for one scene.

perks.name: Team Requisition
perks.description: Up to the margin of the win, provide additional copies of the same weapon.

perks.name: Special Features
perks.description: Weapon comes with special features (thermal sights, disguised cases) up to margin of win.

perks.name: Exotics
perks.description: Procure rare or one-of-a-kind weapons or ammunition.

perks.name: Untraceable
perks.description: Weapons are completely untraceable and never lead authorities to the Hunters.

perks.name: Backup Piece
perks.description: Once per scene, declare a hidden weapon even if the main Edge test fails.

edges.name: Fleet
edges.description: The Hunter has access to a wide variety of personal or commercial vehicles on short notice.
edges.edge_pool: Intelligence + Technology (own fleet) or Manipulation + Persuasion (contacts)
edges.system: Win test at Difficulty 4 to provide a single vehicle for one scene.

perks.name: Armor
perks.description: Vehicles are armored against small firearms. +2 dice to defense against ranged weapons.

perks.name: Performance
perks.description: Superior handling. Bonus equal to margin (max 3) on pursuit-related Driving tests.

perks.name: Surveillance
perks.description: Concealed surveillance tools. Bonus equal to margin (max 3) on stakeout tests.

perks.name: Untraceable
perks.description: Vehicles are completely untraceable.

perks.name: Hidden Cache
perks.description: Hidden compartment (+2 Difficulty to locate). Can use Arsenal/Ordnance even if gear is taken.

perks.name: Wagon Train
perks.description: If vehicle is lost, make second test for replacement (lacks one Perk or +1 Difficulty).

edges.name: Ordnance
edges.description: The Hunter has access to timed or remotely detonated munitions (mines, C4, demolition charges).
edges.edge_pool: Composure + Science (builds own) or Composure + Streetwise (contacts)
edges.system: Win test at Difficulty 4 to provide a single mine or explosive for one scene.

perks.name: Multiple Payloads
perks.description: Provide additional explosives up to the margin of the win.

perks.name: Non-lethal Munitions
perks.description: Obtain flash grenades or tear gas. Dice penalty equal to margin (max 3).

perks.name: Exotics
perks.description: Custom or rare substances that can exploit supernatural vulnerabilities.

perks.name: Disguised Delivery
perks.description: Items disguised as mundane objects. +Difficulty to detect (equal to margin, max 3).

edges.name: Library
edges.description: Access to a wealth of information on supernatural creatures through texts or encrypted databases.
edges.system: Spend a day researching, then win Edge test. Receive clues about quarry. Once per session.

perks.name: Where They Hide
perks.description: Bonus to locate creature's lair (equal to margin, max 3, expires after use).

perks.name: Who They Are
perks.description: Bonus to identify the prey (equal to margin, max 3, expires after use).

perks.name: How to Halt Them
perks.description: Bonus to ward/protect from prey (equal to margin, max 3, expires after use).

perks.name: How to Harm Them
perks.description: Bonus to exploit supernatural weaknesses (equal to margin, max 3, expires after use).

perks.name: Binge
perks.description: Research time is cut in half.

perks.name: Friendly Librarian
perks.description: Wait 1-2 days before roll to gain 1 automatic success.

perks.name: Group Study
perks.description: +1 bonus die per cell member participating in research.

perks.name: Permanent Fixture
perks.description: Campus library can be used as a safe house once per semester.

perks.name: How to Silence Them
perks.description: Bonus to damage target in social combat (equal to margin, max 3, expires after use).

perks.name: Pattern Analysis
perks.description: Narrow down monster behavior and find people familiar with the phenomenon.

perks.name: Where they Go
perks.description: Bonus to identify prey's targets/hunting grounds (equal to margin, max 3, expires after use).

edges.name: Experimental Medicine
edges.description: Access to experimental medical procedures in exchange for being a test subject.
edges.system: Heal Aggravated damage. Difficulty = half current Aggravated (rounded up). Win heals completely, fail inflicts Impaired + raises Danger by 1.

perks.name: Improved Resilience
perks.description: Armor Value of 1 when unarmored until end of next story.

perks.name: Monstrous Enhancement
perks.description: +2 to one Attribute (max 5), but gain weakness to common material (Aggravated damage).

perks.name: Phoenix Protocol
perks.description: Heal Health twice as fast, Aggravatedâ†’Superficial. Can't use Drive for Desperation. End: Aggravated Willpower damage.

perks.name: Unstable Steroids
perks.description: +1 to one Attribute until next story. If enter Despair, suffer 1 Aggravated damage.

edges.name: Improvised Gear
edges.description: Create short-lived but useful tools from ordinary materials.
edges.system: Win test at Difficulty 4 to create equipment that adds 2-dice advantage to a Skill. Lasts one scene.

perks.name: Frugal
perks.description: Can apply this Edge anywhere with trinkets/tools in a bag.

perks.name: Mass Production
perks.description: Produce additional identical items equal to the margin.

perks.name: Specialization
perks.description: Items for specific Skill grant 3-dice bonus instead of 2. (Take multiple times, once per Skill)

perks.name: Speed Crafting
perks.description: Can use under duress. Craft in 3 turns minus margin (minimum 1 turn).

perks.name: Made to Last
perks.description: Items last for additional scenes equal to margin (minimum 1).

edges.name: Global Access
edges.description: Digital larceny beyond normal hacking capabilities.
edges.system: Spend a scene, win test at Difficulty 4 to obtain data from any database.

perks.name: Watching Big Brother
perks.description: Manipulate digital surveillance footage, edit people in/out of records.

perks.name: All-Access Pass
perks.description: Bypass electronic locks, disable security (Difficulty 3-5).

perks.name: Money Trap
perks.description: Manipulate financial data. Lower target's Resources by 1 per margin for 1 month.

perks.name: The Letter of the Law
perks.description: Manipulate criminal records (Difficulty 3 local, 5 global).

perks.name: Digital Cannon Fodder
perks.description: Reduce success of digital surveillance/trace by 2.

perks.name: Intranet Insertion
perks.description: Access non-networked systems remotely. May auto-increase Danger.

perks.name: Spoof
perks.description: Pin intrusion on fake/real person (Difficulty 3-5).

edges.name: Drone Jockey
edges.description: Control an advanced drone with expert skill.
edges.system: Drone performs 2 Skills using Wits+Technology. 5 health, active 1 day + margin. Repair: Difficulty 3, heal margin health.

perks.name: Autonomous
perks.description: Run drones with simple patterns (complex needs Resolve+Technology). Uses 5-dice pool.

perks.name: Variants
perks.description: Additional drone variant with 2 different Skills. (Take multiple times)

perks.name: Specialist Skill
perks.description: Drone gains additional Skill (Larceny, Science, etc.). (Take multiple times per drone)

perks.name: Armaments
perks.description: Equipped with SMG/taser (5-dice pool, or Wits+Technology if directly controlled).

perks.name: Payload
perks.description: Carry large cargo. Moves slower, +2 dice to detect.

perks.name: Electronic Shield
perks.description: Cannot be hacked. If hackable, Difficulty = 2 + operator's margin.

edges.name: Beast Whisperer
edges.description: Understand and command loyal animal companions.
edges.edge_pool: Charisma + Animal Ken (commands), Composure + Animal Ken (training)
edges.system: Choose one animal type with key action pool. Completely loyal companion.

perks.name: Incorruptible
perks.description: Animal immune to supernatural powers that would sway it away.

perks.name: Menagerie
perks.description: Choose another animal type. (Take multiple times)

perks.name: Complex Commands
perks.description: Animals understand complex commands. Charisma+Animal Ken to command, Intelligence+Animal Ken to understand.

perks.name: Incognito
perks.description: Animal can stay out of sight or blend into environments.

perks.name: Supernatural Scent
perks.description: Track specific supernatural type by scent (max 12 hours old). (Take multiple times per creature type)

edges.name: Turncoat
edges.description: Work as a double agent, convincing Quarry of complete loyalty.
edges.system: Edge test vs Difficulty = half target's Intelligence+Wits. Target believes Hunter is 100% loyal.

perks.name: Deathbed Confession
perks.description: Use Turncoat during combat (full action).

perks.name: Poker Face
perks.description: +2 dice when questioned.

perks.name: Stick to the Plan
perks.description: Cell understands Turncoat Hunter's intent without communication.

perks.name: We Come as a Team
perks.description: Bring cellmates (up to margin). Can vouch for them with Turncoat test.

edges.name: Sense the Unnatural
edges.description: Detect nearby supernatural creatures using an object of focus.
edges.system: Win test (Difficulty 3-5) to detect presence. Must hold focus object. Costs 1 Willpower for additional attempts per scene.

perks.name: Creature Specialization
perks.description: +2 dice vs specific creature type. (Take multiple times, once per type)

perks.name: Range
perks.description: Extended to city block size (doesn't give precision beyond same room/farther).

perks.name: Precision
perks.description: Determine WHO the supernatural creature is (not type unless specialized).

perks.name: Handsfree
perks.description: No longer need object of focus.

perks.name: Horrid Detail
perks.description: Cut through supernatural disguises to see real/non-physical form.

perks.name: Network
perks.description: Wits+Insight: Determine if anyone is under influence or had recent supernatural contact.

edges.name: Repel the Unnatural
edges.description: Repel supernatural creatures by brandishing an object of focus.
edges.system: Win test (Difficulty = half creature's Composure+Resolve) to hold back creature while stationary. Moving requires retest each turn.

perks.name: Ward
perks.description: Extend protection to 2 meters + 1 meter per margin.

perks.name: Damage
perks.description: Use focus as melee weapon (+0 damage, Aggravated). Must retest or protection fails.

perks.name: Creature Specialization
perks.description: +2 dice vs specific creature type. (Take multiple times, once per type)

perks.name: Handsfree
perks.description: No longer need object of focus.

edges.name: Thwart the Unnatural
edges.description: Highly resistant to supernatural mental abilities.
edges.system: While holding focus: immune to supernatural mental effects requiring resistance. Can resist automatic effects with Edge test.

perks.name: Creature Specialization
perks.description: +2 dice vs specific creature type. (Take multiple times, once per type)

perks.name: Ward
perks.description: Extend protection to 2 meters + 1 meter per margin. Hunter makes all resistance tests.

perks.name: Recognition
perks.description: If resist successfully, aware of attempt and what power would have done.

perks.name: Handsfree
perks.description: No longer need object of focus.

perks.name: Redirection
perks.description: On successful resist: Take 1 Superficial Willpower, redirect ability to user.

edges.name: Artifact
edges.description: Possess a rare tool that provides supernatural benefits.
edges.system: Relic provides 1-dice bonus to single Skill (not for Artifact Edge tests). Can be object of focus. Hard to regain if lost.

perks.name: Empower
perks.description: Once per scene: Test at Difficulty 4 to increase bonus to 3 dice. Fail: Superficial Willpower damage = margin lost.

perks.name: Attraction
perks.description: Many seek this item. +2 dice to ambush attempts. Once revealed, seekers will continue looking.

perks.name: Detection
perks.description: Acts like Sense the Unnatural Edge.

perks.name: Shield
perks.description: Physical damage from supernatural sources is halved.

perks.name: Feature Unlocked
perks.description: Once per story at Danger 5: Spend Willpower to reroll non-Desperation dice. Successes = critical wins.

edges.name: Cleanse the Unnatural
edges.description: Drive out supernatural influence from victims, freeing them from control.
edges.edge_pool: Charisma + Persuasion (Exorcism), Resolve + Science (Psychic), or Manipulation + Occult (Faith)
edges.system: Difficulty based on duration (1=same scene, 2=24hrs, 3=week, 4=year, 5=beyond). Target takes 3 Aggravated -1 per margin. Win: Control regained for 24 hours.

perks.name: Bedside Manner
perks.description: Damage becomes Superficial and rounded down after halving.

perks.name: Inflict Stigmata
perks.description: +1 Aggravated Health damage but -2 Difficulty. Stigmata are permanent.

perks.name: Trace the Threads
perks.description: ST answers 1 question about controller's location per margin point.

perks.name: Psychic Backlash
perks.description: Controlling entity receives 1 Aggravated per 2 margin (Hunter chooses Health/Willpower).

edges.name: Great Destiny
edges.description: Empowered to fulfill a higher purpose.
edges.system: Choose higher purpose/destiny. Start each session with 2-dice pool to add to rolls furthering destiny.

perks.name: Divine Protection
perks.description: When taking Health damage serving destiny: reduce by 2 (minimum 0).

perks.name: Heavenly Resolve
perks.description: When taking Social Combat damage defending/proselytizing destiny: restore 1 Aggravated Willpower.

perks.name: Sacred Insight
perks.description: Once per story: Supernatural voice/vision provides clue to fulfill destiny.

perks.name: Influence Fate
perks.description: Once per session: Influence target to take 1 action aiding destiny. Charisma+Occult vs Resolve+Occult.

edges.name: Unnatural Changes
edges.description: Use body in ways no standard human could.
edges.system: Select one Attribute. Test at Difficulty 4: Win = +2 dice to all rolls using Attribute for scene. Fail = Aggravated damage = margin. Despair ends effect.

perks.name: Breadth
perks.description: Select second Attribute. +1 die to all pools using that Attribute.

perks.name: Maximized Neuropathways
perks.description: Activation doesn't use an action.

perks.name: Neuropathway Practice
perks.description: Reduce Difficulty from 4 to 3.

perks.name: Handsfree
perks.description: No longer rely on object of focus.

categories.name: Assets
categories.description: Access to items, tools, or contacts that a typical private citizen wouldn't be able to obtain.

categories.name: Aptitudes
categories.description: Abilities that, while not supernatural, defy what is normally accomplished with skill and instruction.

categories.name: Endowments
categories.description: Abilities that go beyond what is natural. May seem magical or superhuman.

character_creation_rules.starting_edges: Players start with Edges based on their character concept and Storyteller approval.
character_creation_rules.purchasing_perks: Players can purchase additional Perks. Most Perks can only be obtained once. Some (like Creature Specialization) can be learned multiple times with no limit on total Perks.
character_creation_rules.note: Unlike previous versions of Hunter, HTR5e does not have a fixed '1 Edge + 2 Perks' rule. Perks are purchased as character advances.
